original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2111)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2111)@</color>對目標區域釋放火牛向前奔襲路徑上的敵人，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2111)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2111)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2111)@</color> release the fire ox to the target area to attack the enemies on the path forward, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2111)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> color>Inflict spell damage on the enemy.
